DOC.brief_summary: The goal open-label Phase Ia study evaluate Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) profile new novel single-dose Ondansetron Pulsatile Release ( Ond-PR ) formulation normal healthy volunteer . After initial phase , investigator follow Phase Ib study determine Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic ( PK/PD ) , safety , tolerability interaction follow simultaneous administration ondansetron formulation 10 mg Methylphenidate Immediate Release ( MPh-IR ) tablet normal healthy volunteer .

DOC.detailed_description: We compare 2 different pulsatile-release formulation ondansetron , PR1 PR2 . Ond-PR1 pH-sensitive formulation Ond-PR2 osmotic-sensitive .
